A: Principles of American Democracy.question_en: What is the supreme law of the land?
The idea of self-government is in the first three words of the Constitution. What are these words?
A: Principles of American Democracy.question_tr: Anayasa'nın ilk üç kelimesinde hangi fikir vardır? Bu üç kelime nelerdir?

A: Principles of American Democracy.question_en: What do we call the first ten amendments to the Constitution?
A: Principles of American Democracy.question_tr: Anayasanın ilk on değişikliğine ne ad verilir?

A: Principles of American Democracy.question_en: What is one right or freedom from the First Amendment?
A: Principles of American Democracy.question_tr: Birinci Değişiklik'ten (First Amendment) bir hak veya özgürlük söyleyiniz.

A: Principles of American Democracy.question_en: How many amendments does the Constitution have?
What did the Declaration of Independence do?
answer_en: said that the United States is free (from Great Britain)
A: Principles of American Democracy.question_tr: Bağımsızlık Bildirgesi (Declaration of Independence) ne yaptı?

A: Principles of American Democracy.question_en: What are two rights in the Declaration of Independence?
A: Principles of American Democracy.question_tr: Bağımsızlık Bildirgesi'nde (Declaration of Independence) belirtilen iki hak nedir?

answer_en: You can practice any religion, or not practice a religion.
answer_tr: Herhangi bir dini uygulayabilirsiniz veya hiç dini uygulamayabilirsiniz.

A: Principles of American Democracy.question_en: What is the economic system in the United States?
A: Principles of American Democracy.question_tr: Amerika Birleşik Devletleri'ndeki ekonomik sistem nedir?

answer_en: No one is above the law.

B: System of Government.question_en: Name one branch or part of the government.
B: System of Government.question_tr: Hükûmetin bir dalını/partisini söyleyiniz.

B: System of Government.question_en: What stops one branch of government from becoming too powerful?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Hükûmetin bir kolunun çok güçlü olmasını ne engeller?

B: System of Government.question_en: Who is in charge of the executive branch?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Yürütme koluna kim başkanlık eder?

B: System of Government.question_en: Who makes federal laws?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Federal yasaları kim yapar?

B: System of Government.question_en: What are the two parts of the U.S. Congress?
B: System of Government.question_tr: ABD Kongresi'nin iki bölümü nelerdir?

B: System of Government.question_en: How many U.S. Senators are there?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Kaç tane ABD Senatörü vardır?

B: System of Government.question_en: We elect a U.S. Senator for how many years?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Bir ABD Senatörü kaç yıllığına seçilir?

B: System of Government.question_en: Who is one of your state's U.S. Senators now?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Eyaletinizin şu anki bir ABD Senatörü kimdir?

B: System of Government.question_en: The House of Representatives has how many voting members?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Temsilciler Meclisi'nin kaç oy hakkına sahip üyesi vardır?

B: System of Government.question_en: We elect a U.S. Representative for how many years?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Bir ABD Temsilcisi kaç yıllığına seçilir?

B: System of Government.question_en: Name your U.S. Representative.
B: System of Government.question_tr: ABD Temsilcinizin adını söyleyiniz.

B: System of Government.question_en: Who does a U.S. Senator represent?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Bir ABD Senatörü kimi temsil eder?

B: System of Government.question_en: Why do some states have more Representatives than other states?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Bazı eyaletlerin diğerlerinden daha fazla Temsilciye sahip olmasının nedeni nedir?

B: System of Government.question_en: We elect a President for how many years?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Bir Başkan kaç yıllığına seçilir?

B: System of Government.question_en: In what month do we vote for President?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Başkan için hangi ay oy kullanılır?

B: System of Government.question_en: What is the name of the President of the United States now?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Şu anki ABD Başkanının adı nedir?

B: System of Government.question_en: What is the name of the Vice President of the United States now?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Şu anki ABD Başkan Yardımcısının adı nedir?

B: System of Government.question_en: If the President can no longer serve, who becomes President?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Eğer Başkan görev yapamazsa, kim Başkan olur?

B: System of Government.question_en: If both the President and the Vice President can no longer serve, who becomes President?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Hem Başkan hem Başkan Yardımcısı görev yapamazsa, kim Başkan olur?
answer_tr: Temsilciler Meclisi Başkanı (Speaker of the House)

B: System of Government.question_en: Who is the Commander in Chief of the military?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Silahlı kuvvetlerin Başkomutanı kimdir?

B: System of Government.question_en: Who signs bills to become laws?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Kanun tasarılarını kanun haline kim getirir (imzalar)?

B: System of Government.question_en: Who vetoes bills?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Kanun tasarılarını kim veto eder?

B: System of Government.question_en: What does the President's Cabinet do?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Başkanın Kabinesi ne yapar?

B: System of Government.question_en: What are two Cabinet-level positions?
answer_en: Secretary of Health and Human Services
Secretary of Housing and Urban Development
B: System of Government.question_tr: İki kabine düzeyinde görev söyleyiniz.

B: System of Government.question_en: What does the judicial branch do?
answer_en: decides if a law goes against the Constitution
B: System of Government.question_tr: Yargı kolu ne yapar?
answer_tr: bir yasanın Anayasaya aykırı olup olmadığını karar verir

B: System of Government.question_en: What is the highest court in the United States?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Amerika Birleşik Devletleri'ndeki en yüksek mahkeme hangisidir?

B: System of Government.question_en: How many justices are on the Supreme Court?
answer_en: Visit uscis.gov/citizenship/testupdates for the number of justices on the Supreme Court.
B: System of Government.question_tr: Yüksek Mahkeme'de kaç yargıç vardır?
answer_tr: Güncel sayı için uscis.gov/citizenship/testupdates adresine bakınız.

B: System of Government.question_en: Who is the Chief Justice of the United States now?
answer_en: Visit uscis.gov/citizenship/testupdates for the name of the Chief Justice of the United States.
B: System of Government.question_tr: Şu anki ABD Baş Yargıcı (Chief Justice) kimdir?
answer_tr: Güncel isim için uscis.gov/citizenship/testupdates adresine bakınız.

B: System of Government.question_en: Under our Constitution, some powers belong to the federal government. What is one power of the federal government?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Anayasamıza göre bazı yetkiler federal hükûmete aittir. Federal hükûmetin bir yetkisi nedir?

B: System of Government.question_en: Under our Constitution, some powers belong to the states. What is one power of the states?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Anayasamıza göre bazı yetkiler eyaletlere aittir. Eyaletlerin bir yetkisi nedir?

B: System of Government.question_en: Who is the Governor of your state now?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Eyaletinizin şu anki Valisi kimdir?

B: System of Government.question_en: What is the capital of your state?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Eyaletinizin başkenti nedir?

B: System of Government.question_en: What are the two major political parties in the United States?
B: System of Government.question_tr: Amerika Birleşik Devletleri'ndeki iki büyük siyasi parti hangileridir?

B: System of Government.question_en: What is the political party of the President now?
answer_en: Visit uscis.gov/citizenship/testupdates for the political party of the President.
B: System of Government.question_tr: Başkanın siyasi partisi hangisidir?
answer_tr: Güncel bilgi için uscis.gov/citizenship/testupdates adresine bakınız.

B: System of Government.question_en: What is the name of the Speaker of the House of Representatives now?
answer_en: Visit uscis.gov/citizenship/testupdates for the name of the Speaker of the House of Representatives.
B: System of Government.question_tr: Temsilciler Meclisi Başkanı'nın (Speaker) adı nedir?
answer_tr: Güncel isim için uscis.gov/citizenship/testupdates adresine bakınız.

C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_en: There are four amendments to the Constitution about who can vote. Describe one of them.
answer_en: You don't have to pay (a poll tax) to vote.
Any citizen can vote. (Women and men can vote.)
A male citizen of any race (can vote).
C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_tr: Oy kullanma hakkı hakkında Anayasa'da dört değişiklik vardır. Bunlardan birini açıklayınız.
answer_tr: On sekiz (18) yaş ve üstü vatandaşlar oy kullanabilir.
Oy kullanmak için (seçim vergisi) ödemek zorunda değilsiniz.
Her vatandaş oy kullanabilir (kadınlar ve erkekler).
Her ırktan erkek vatandaş oy kullanabiliriz gibi (Irk ayrımcılığına ilişkin düzenleme).

C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_en: What is one responsibility that is only for United States citizens?
C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_tr: Sadece ABD vatandaşlarına ait bir sorumluluk nedir?

C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_en: Name one right only for United States citizens.
C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_tr: Sadece ABD vatandaşlarına ait bir hakkı söyleyiniz.

C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_en: What are two rights of everyone living in the United States?
C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_tr: ABD'de yaşayan herkesin iki hakkı nedir?

C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_en: What do we show loyalty to when we say the Pledge of Allegiance?
C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_tr: Sadakat Yemini (Pledge of Allegiance) söylerken kime bağlılık gösteririz?

C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_en: What is one promise you make when you become a United States citizen?
answer_en: give up loyalty to other countries
defend the Constitution and laws of the United States
obey the laws of the United States
serve in the U.S. military (if needed)
serve (do important work for) the nation (if needed)
be loyal to the United States
C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_tr: ABD vatandaşı olduğunuzda verdiğiniz bir söz nedir?

C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_en: How old do citizens have to be to vote for President?
C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_tr: Başkan için oy kullanmak için vatandaşların en az kaç yaşında olması gerekir?

C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_en: What are two ways that Americans can participate in their democracy?
answer_en: give an elected official your opinion on an issue
publicly support or oppose an issue or policy
C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_tr: Amerikalılar demokrasilerine katılmak için iki yol söyleyiniz.
answer_tr: bir konuyu kamuoyunda desteklemek veya karşı çıkmak

C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_en: When is the last day you can send in federal income tax forms?
C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_tr: Federal gelir vergisi formlarını gönderebileceğiniz son gün ne zamandır?

C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_en: When must all men register for the Selective Service?
C: Rights and Responsibilities.question_tr: Tüm erkekler Selective Service'e (askerlik kaydı) ne zaman kaydolmalıdır?
answer_tr: on sekiz (18) ile yirmi altı (26) yaşları arasında

A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_en: What is one reason colonists came to America?
A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_tr: Sömürgeciler Amerika'ya gelme nedenlerinden biri nedir?

A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_en: Who lived in America before the Europeans arrived?
A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_tr: Avrupalılar gelmeden önce Amerika'da kimler yaşıyordu?

A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_en: What group of people was taken to America and sold as slaves?
A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_tr: Hangi insan grubu Amerika'ya götürülüp köle olarak satıldı?

A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_en: Why did the colonists fight the British?
answer_en: because of high taxes (taxation without representation)
because the British army stayed in their houses (boarding, quartering)

A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_en: Who wrote the Declaration of Independence?
A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_tr: Bağımsızlık Bildirgesi'ni (Declaration of Independence) kim yazdı?

A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_en: When was the Declaration of Independence adopted?
A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_tr: Bağımsızlık Bildirgesi ne zaman kabul edildi?

A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_en: There were 13 original states. Name three.
What happened at the Constitutional Convention?
answer_en: The Founding Fathers wrote the Constitution.

A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_en: The Federalist Papers supported the passage of the U.S. Constitution. Name one of the writers.
A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_tr: Federalist Papers, ABD Anayasası'nın geçişini destekledi. Yazarlardan birini söyleyiniz.

A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_en: What is one thing Benjamin Franklin is famous for?
answer_en: oldest member of the Constitutional Convention
first Postmaster General of the United States
A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_tr: Benjamin Franklin hangi önemli şeylerle ünlüdür?

A: Colonial Period and Independence.question_en: Who is the 'Father of Our Country'?

B: 1800s.question_en: What territory did the United States buy from France in 1803?
B: 1800s.question_tr: ABD 1803'te hangi bölgeyi Fransa'dan satın aldı?

B: 1800s.question_en: Name one war fought by the United States in the 1800s.
Name the U.S. war between the North and the South.
B: 1800s.question_tr: Kuzey ile Güney arasındaki ABD savaşı hangisidir?
answer_tr: Eyaletler Arası Savaş (War between the States)

B: 1800s.question_en: Name one problem that led to the Civil War.
B: 1800s.question_tr: İç Savaşa yol açan sorunlardan birini söyleyiniz.

B: 1800s.question_en: What was one important thing that Abraham Lincoln did?
answer_en: led the United States during the Civil War
B: 1800s.question_tr: Abraham Lincoln'un önemli bir işi neydi?
answer_tr: İç Savaş sırasında ABD'ye liderlik etti

B: 1800s.question_en: What did the Emancipation Proclamation do?
answer_en: freed slaves in the Confederate states
freed slaves in most Southern states

B: 1800s.question_en: What did Susan B. Anthony do?

C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_en: Name one war fought by the United States in the 1900s.
Who was President during World War I?
C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_tr: I. Dünya Savaşı sırasında Başkan kimdi?

C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_en: Who was President during the Great Depression and World War II?
C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_tr: Büyük Buhran ve II. Dünya Savaşı sırasında Başkan kimdi?

C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_en: Who did the United States fight in World War II?
C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_tr: ABD II. Dünya Savaşı'nda kimlerle savaştı?

C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_en: Before he was President, Eisenhower was a general. What war was he in?
C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_tr: Başkan olmadan önce Eisenhower bir generaldi. Hangi savaşta görev yaptı?

C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_en: During the Cold War, what was the main concern of the United States?
C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_tr: Soğuk Savaş sırasında ABD'nin ana endişesi neydi?

C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_en: What movement tried to end racial discrimination?
C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_tr: Irksal ayrımcılığı sona erdirmeye çalışan hareket nedir?

C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_en: What did Martin Luther King, Jr. do?
answer_en: worked for equality for all Americans
C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_tr: Martin Luther King Jr. ne yaptı?
answer_tr: tüm Amerikalılar için eşitlik için çalıştı

C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_en: What major event happened on September 11, 2001, in the United States?
C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_tr: 11 Eylül 2001'de ABD'de hangi büyük olay oldu?

C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_en: Name one American Indian tribe in the United States.
C: Recent American History and Other Imp.question_tr: ABD'deki Kızılderili kabilelerinden birinin adını söyleyiniz.

A: Geography.question_en: Name one of the two longest rivers in the United States.
A: Geography.question_tr: ABD'deki en uzun iki nehirden birinin adını söyleyiniz.

A: Geography.question_en: What ocean is on the West Coast of the United States?
A: Geography.question_tr: ABD'nin Batı Kıyısı'nda hangi okyanus vardır?

A: Geography.question_en: What ocean is on the East Coast of the United States?
A: Geography.question_tr: ABD'nin Doğu Kıyısı'nda hangi okyanus vardır?

A: Geography.question_en: Name one state that borders Canada.
A: Geography.question_tr: Kanada ile sınırı olan bir eyalet söyleyiniz.

A: Geography.question_en: Name one state that borders Mexico.
A: Geography.question_tr: Meksika ile sınırı olan bir eyalet söyleyiniz.

A: Geography.question_en: What is the capital of the United States?
Where is the Statue of Liberty?

B: Symbols.question_en: Why does the flag have 13 stripes?
answer_en: because the stripes represent the original colonies

B: Symbols.question_en: Why does the flag have 50 stars?
answer_en: because there is one star for each state
because each star represents a state
answer_tr: her eyalet için bir yıldız olduğu için
her yıldız bir eyaleti temsil eder

B: Symbols.question_en: What is the name of the national anthem?

C: Holidays.question_en: When do we celebrate Independence Day?
C: Holidays.question_tr: Bağımsızlık Günü (Independence Day) ne zaman kutlanır?
